name: Block Jumper v_1
description:
Block Jumper v_1

HOW TO RUN:

- Extract the .zip and place the folder to your desired location.

- Click on Platformer_v1.jar and the game should pop up.

Unfortunately, the original java file got corrupted, so I am unable to update this version. However, I do have another one coming soon with better controls and polish.

Obviously, this is my first game, so it is very basic. But this is just a test run to get my foot in the door, as I plan on doing much better stuff later on. 

The game is just a simple platformer. Use A and D to move, and W is to jump. Esc is to pause, and P is to start the game. There are 30 levels you must get through in order to beat the game.

Your character only has bottom collision, so you are able to travel up walls when you hit them. This can be a help or a hindrance, and different levels will show you how this works. 

Hope you enjoy it!
